'''The Chasm Delvers''' is a [[World Quest]] Series containing quests related to [[The Chasm]] in [[Liyue]]. To unlock this quest, players must complete [[Chapter I]]: Act III - [[A New Star Approaches]].

A part of this quest series needs to be completed to progress through the [[Archon Quest]], [[In the Depths, an Unexpected Reunion]].
